titleStmt.title: Die Martis scilicet xvj die Novem[b]. anno Dom. 1641 annoq. regni regis dom. nostri Caroli, [xv]ij whereas sundrie persons have traiterously and rebel[liou]sly taken armes in Vlster ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Parliament.
